explains: n. 很深的裂缝；砍得很深的伤口
vt. 划开；砍入很深；（使）负深伤

sentences.en: He was bleeding from a gash on his head.
There was an inch-long gash just above his right eye.
sentences.cn: 就在他的右眼上方，有一道一英寸长的伤口。

sentences.en: "Okay," he replied and winced as she dabbed the cotton swab over the gash.
sentences.cn: 当她用棉签轻擦他的伤口时，他应了一声“行了”，还躲了一下。
